meanings: improvement of a species of tomato

vlive.korean: 한복을 개량을 했다고 할까? - 한복? They look like modernized Hanbok or... Hanbok? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [FULL] YURI SHOWCASE [The First Scene]
vlive.english: They look like modernized Hanbok or... Hanbok?

vlive.korean: 솔직히 개량한복도 입고 다닐 수 있을... Frankly, I think I can go around in modernized hanbok. 듣기 View video KANG DANIEL : Danielkkkkkkk
vlive.english: Frankly, I think I can go around in modernized hanbok.

vlive.korean: 얘도 개량한복이야. His is a modern hanbok. 듣기 View video 2PM : 2PM 미니팬미팅 <양반의 놀이> 비하인드
개량한복이란 아날로그다. Modernized hanboks are analog. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : <그물> 김기덕 라이브 인터뷰 ' Kim Ki-Duk Live Interview'
코코넛을 개량해서 만든 그릇이죠. It's a cup made out of a coconut shell. 듣기 View video EXO : DRAMA TALK - <미씽나인> 드라마 토크
vlive.english: It's a cup made out of a coconut shell.

examples.korean: This particular model has a further refinement. 발음듣기 이 특정 모델은 추가로 더 개량한 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This particular model has a further refinement. 발음

examples.korean: This can hardly be improved on [upon]. 발음듣기 이것은 개량의 여지가 거의 없다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This can hardly be improved on [upon]. 발음

examples.korean: This car can be used if you tease up. 발음듣기 이 차를 조금 손질하여 개량하면 사용할 수 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This car can be used if you tease up. 발음

examples.korean: You cannot improve this machine. 발음듣기 이 기계는 개량할 수 없다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You cannot improve this machine. 발음

examples.korean: This was made possible by crop breeding in concert with other farming innovations. 발음듣기 이것은 곡물 품종 개량이 다른 농업 혁신과 맞물려 가능해졌던 것이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This was made possible by crop breeding in concert with other farming innovations. 발음
